Package org.steelhawks.lib.math

Class Angle

java.lang.Object
org.steelhawks.lib.math.Angle
public class Angle extends Object
A class representing an angle in radians, with methods for conversion and normalization. This class provides utility methods for working with angles in various formats, including degrees and rotations.
